comment:
Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): amount of money invested in condos (in dollars)
- \( y \): amount of money invested in detached houses (in dollars)

Definitions:
- Total budget: \( x + y \leq 760000 \)
- Profit from condos: \( 0.50x \)
- Profit from detached houses: \( y \)
- Minimum investment in condos: \( x \geq 0.20(x+y) \)
- Minimum investment in detached houses: \( y \geq 20000 \)

Objective:
Maximize total profit: \( 0.50x + y \)
